lead_paragraph: The police said the 36-year-old man had a knife when he entered a library in Lyndhurst, N.J.

headline.print_headline: Man Shot by Police in Library Dies
headline.main: Man Is Dead After Shooting by Police at New Jersey Library

snippet: The police said the 36-year-old man had a knife when he entered a library in Lyndhurst, N.J.
abstract: New Jersey authorities say police officers shot and killed knife-wielding man Kevin Allen after following him into library in Lyndhurst.
